description.en: Brick Hill is the ultimate building block game, allowing you to push the limits of digital bricks and make your own games.
description.ga_IE: Is é cnoc bríce an cluiche bloc tógála deiridh, rud a ligeann duit na teorainneacha brící digiteacha a bhrú agus do chuid cluichí féin a dhéanamh.
